attributes.action: Assist Ukraine in the war with the Russian Federation further
attributes.additional_details: The war against Ukraine is escalating. The equipment list is based on information received from the territorial force. We understand that Russia is bombing and shelling hospitals. Nothing indicates that Russia will not attack chemical plants, power plants or even nuclear reactors. The President of Ukraine referred to the Russian actions as genocide on 26/02/2022. The Ukrainian air defence is the weakest link. Air strikes hit military and civilian targets and cause destruction, panic and death.
attributes.background:
Supply all possible air defence systems, PPE, military first aid kits, warm clothes, Kevlar shirts, thermal imaging cameras
Push allies to block Ukraine’s airspace from Russian aircraft
Recognise actions of Russia towards Ukraine as genocide
Provide refugee status to Ukrainians fleeing the war

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Pledge any necessary military support to defend Ukraine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607314

Seek to impose a no-fly zone over Ukraine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609437

Help Ukrainian refugees and create a safe path for them to get to the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609574

Draw up and implement a specific Ukrainian refugee strategy for the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609431

Determining whether war crimes, including genocide, have taken place are a matter for the courts, not the UK Government or Parliament.
